title: go/doc/headscan: headscan finds no headings in $GOROOT/src
body:
What does 'go version' print?

go version devel +6b696a34e0af Sun Aug 03 15:14:59 2014 -0700 linux/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?

go run $GOROOT/src/pkg/go/doc/headscan.go

What happened?

The command printed "0 headings found".

What should have happened instead?

The command should have printed "[insert integer greater than 0] headings
found". There are headings in $GOROOT/src/pkg/encoding/gob/doc.go, for example.

I'm looking into the problem, but I would appreciate a sanity check.
